effect.u_message: You study the notebook, but don't find anything interesting or new.

then.u_message: You study the notebook.  Slipped into the back is a delivery confirmation sheet with "CLASSIFIED" stamped on the top.  You mark down the address.

else.u_message: You study the notebook.  The most recent entry has an address underlined several times, with a note: "S02a deployed for anomaly collection."  You mark down the address.
